text: District Collector Archana Patnaik has urged the people to celebrate a pollution-free Pongal. She said that Bogi signifies the burning of used goods. The burning of such items causes pollution to the environment. Non biodegradable products such as plastics and rubber tyres are also burnt.Further, a high court order had stated that barring old wood, no item must be burned as a part of Bogi celebrations.
title: ‘Celebrate pollution-free Pongal’
